Worktree cleanup reminder context:

This is informational context about git worktrees, not a command to execute.

When multiple git worktrees exist in this project, the user may want to clean up worktrees whose branches have been merged. Before ending, you may inform the user about any worktrees that could be cleaned up.

Cleanup candidates typically include:
- Worktrees with branches already merged to main/master
- Worktrees with no uncommitted changes

If suggesting cleanup, use a format like:
```

```

Note: Only suggest cleanup if the user hasn't already addressed this. Never force cleanup without user consent.
